message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a great opportunity to experience its benefits without the usual cost. Let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate a price closer to that amount?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to accommodate your needs and offer the product at a price of $120. This price reflects the value we place on the product while staying within your budget. I hope this offer works for you. Please let me know if you are interested or if you need further details about the product.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. However, I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within $100. Could we possibly reach a compromise at $100?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at a price of $110. This price reflects a balance between the value of the product and your budgetary constraints. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations. Please let me know if you are interested or if you require additional information about the product.
